scripts.test: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' webpack && K6_WEB_DASHBOARD=true K6_WEB_DASHBOARD_EXPORT=html-report.html k6 run dist/shopperjourney.js
scripts.docker: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' webpack && docker run --rm -i --network awesome-localstack_my-private-ntwk -e BACKEND_URL=http://backend:4001 -v $(pwd)/dist:/dist -w /dist grafana/k6 run shopperjourney.js
scripts.docker-windows: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS='--openssl-legacy-provider' webpack && docker run --rm -i --network awesome-localstack_my-private-ntwk -e BACKEND_URL=http://backend:4001 -v %cd%\dist:/dist -w /dist grafana/k6 run shopperjourney.js
